<div class="machineList container">
    <form ng-submit="createDisk()">
        <div class="row margin-bottom-large">
            <span class="left margin-right-medium" style="padding-top: 7px; min-width: 80px;">Name:</span>
            <input type="text" ng-model="disk.name" class="form-control width-40 left margin-right-medium" required placeholder="Disk name..">
        </div>
        <div class="row margin-bottom-large">
            <span class="left margin-right-medium" style="padding-top: 7px; min-width: 80px;">Size:</span>
            <input type="number" min="1" max="2000" ng-model="disk.size" class="form-control width-40 left margin-right-medium" ng-pattern="/^[0-9]{1,9}$/" required placeholder="Size in Gigabytes..">
            <span style="padding-top: 6px; display: block;">GB</span>
        </div>
        <div class="row margin-bottom-large">
            <span class="left margin-right-medium" style="padding-top: 7px; min-width: 80px;">Description:</span>
            <textarea rows="4" cols="50" class="form-control width-40 left margin-right-medium" ng-model="disk.description" placeholder="Description notes.."></textarea>
        </div>
    <div class="marginTopXlarge row">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="alert alert-warning span4 margin-bottom-large margin-left-large" ng-show="disk.size == '' || disk.size < 1 || disk.size > 2000">
                <em class="block margin-bottom-small" ng-show="machine.status != 'HALTED'">Machine must be stopped to create disk.</em>
                <em class="block" ng-show="disk.size < 1 || disk.size > 2000">Size can only be between 1GB and up to 2000GB.</em>
            </div>
        </div>
        <button class="btn btn-info mainButton" type="submit" ng-disabled="!isValidCreateDisk()">
            <i class="fa fa-hdd-o txt-20"></i>
            <span class="margin-left-small">Create disk</span>
        </button>
    </div>
    </form>
</div>
